step2.ptxt: The components have the following functions:

entry.ptxt: Detects the distance between the vehicle and the obstacle.
Judges the approximate distance between the vehicle and obstacle based on the signals from the No. 1 ultrasonic sensors and sends the buzzer signal to the No. 1 clearance warning buzzer.
Sounds intermittently to inform the driver that the rear clearance warning ECU assembly has detected an obstacle within the prescribed range.
Back Sonar or Clearance Sonar Switch Assembly
Turns the TOYOTA parking assist-sensor system on/off.
Transmits the on/off signals of the back-up light switch assembly to the rear clearance sonar ECU assembly.
Transmits the R position signal to the rear clearance sonar ECU assembly.

step2.ptxt: The operating conditions of the ultrasonic sensor are as follows:

item.ptxt: Back sonar or clearance sonar switch is on.

step3.ptxt: The No. 1 ultrasonic sensor consists of a circuit portion and a microphone that transmits and receives ultrasonic waves.
The circuit portion is filled with urethane to prevent water from entering.
When the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor transmits ultrasonic waves and receives the reflected waves from an obstacle, the buzzer sounds in stages in accordance with the distance to the obstacle.

The rear clearance warning ECU assembly effects overall control of the system, including switching between transmission and reception of the ultrasonic sensor signals, processing the received wave signals, determining the presence of obstacles, actuating the No. 1 clearance warning buzzer, and determining the presence of an open circuit in the sensors.

step2.ptxt: After the TOYOTA parking assist-sensor system has started its activation, it sounds the No. 1 clearance warning buzzer for approximately 1 second, while checking for any malfunctions in the No. 1 ultrasonic sensors.
The on and off times of the No. 1 clearance warning buzzer vary as shown in the table below, depending on the distance between the obstacle and the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor:

If the system cannot activate its detection function due to a malfunction in an No. 1 ultrasonic sensor, it alerts the driver of the malfunction by sounding the No. 1 clearance warning buzzer. For details, refer to the corresponding Repair Manual for this model.
